alert.note: Alert for Kent; Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 8:05AM EDT until August 18 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Windham County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Southwestern Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Southern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... West central Bristol County in southeastern Massachusetts... Northwestern Washington County in Rhode Island... Northwestern Kent County in Rhode Island... Providence County in Rhode Island... * Until 900 AM EDT. * At 805 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brooklyn, or near Plainfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Milford, Plainfield, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, and Central Falls. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
